dialogue: Please let me do my job...

This seems like the perfect place to start researching the cure, but I can't collect the items myself. Could you do something for me? I need the tools that are necessary for my research. Will you arrange them for me?
Good, now what I need you to do is find a sample of these creatures' blood. I will examine it in order to find cure.
You got it? Perfect! I'll analyze it now, but i propose we do not waste time and in the meantime you can bring me a set of chemicals?
Thank you. I do not think there is much left for me to finish my research. While I will be working here, please find the syringes, we will need them in order to test the cure on those beasts.
I am eternally grateful to you. I will repay you for what you did for me.
If you need more health, you can always go to lab. I will provide you with the best care I can, and in fact... the only you can currently get...
Oh, are you here to save me? I am doing fine, but I think I could use some company.
Hey you, if you need a new weapon go to armoury, I will provide you with the best weapons in this county ... for a small fee, of course.
How nice of you to come for me.
